Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Madman \Mad"man\, n.; pl. {Madmen}. A man who is mad; lunatic; a crazy person. [1913 Webster]
When a man mistakes his thoughts for person and things, he is mad. A madman is properly so defined. --Coleridge. [1913 Webster]
